nodes.text: Green Three was the callsign attributed to the third pilot of Green Squadron.
During the Massacre near Teralov, a pilot of Green Squadron of the rebellion used the callsign Green Three.
Around the time of the Battle of Scarif, the Rebel pilot Riss Clyos used the callsign Green Three.
Shortly after the evacuation of Hoth, during a battle at Rendezvous Point Delta-Three and another battle at Elessia, Shara Bey used the callsign Green Three.
During the Battle of Endor, a Rebel pilot used the callsign Green Three.
